dswe package¶

Submodules¶

dswe.knn module¶

class dswe.knn.KNNPowerCurve(algorithms=['auto'], weights=['uniform', 'distance'])[source]¶

Bases: object

k-nearest neighbors regression model.

All the parameters are fine-tuned automatically using GridSearch. No need to explicitly pass anything.

Parameters

  • weights ({'auto', 'distance'}) --

    • 'uniform' : uniform weights. All points in each neighborhood

    are weighted equally. - 'distance' : weight points by the inverse of their distance. in this case, closer neighbors of a query point will have a greater influence than neighbors which are further away.

  • algorithms (Algorithm used to compute the nearest neighbors.) --

    • 'auto' will attempt to decide the most appropriate algorithm

    based on the values passed to 'fit' method.

fit(X, y, subset_selection=False)[source]¶

Fit the KNNPowerCurve from the training dataset.

Parameters

  • X ({array-like, sparse matrix} of shape (n_samples, n_features)) -- Training data.

  • y ({array-like, sparse matrix} of shape (n_samples,)) -- Target values.

Returns

self

Return type

The fitted KNNPowerCurve.

predict(X)[source]¶

Predict the target for the provided data.

Parameters

X (array-like of shape (n_queries, n_features)) -- Test samples.

Returns

y -- Predicted target values.

Return type

ndarray of shape (n_queries,)

update(X, y)[source]¶

Update the model when new training dataset will arrive.

Parameters

  • X ({array-like, sparse matrix} of shape (n_samples, n_features)) -- New training data.

  • y ({array-like, sparse matrix} of shape (n_samples,)) -- New target values.

Returns

self

Return type

The fitted KNNPowerCurve.

Validates the inputs to KNNPowerCurve.
